page.title: 15Ecology
page.content: The weather around Bagnall in Winter is normally quite severe with snow and frost and temperatures normally below -3 degrees centigrade.Temperatures of up to -33 degrees centigrade.This obviously produces many problems on the narrow lanes. The wildlife in the area prospors in the countryside ,ranging from Butterflies to foxes to even a heron who lives in a local pool. Though there is not much woodland tree felling is taking place in the area. The air around Bagnall is very clean with little pollution and this is one of the attractions for people moving into the area.
